name: Tyrannosaurus Rex
description: One of the largest land predators ever known, with massive jaws and powerful legs.

name: Triceratops
description: A large herbivorous dinosaur with three horns and a bony frill around its neck.

name: Velociraptor
description: A small, fast predator with sharp claws and feathers, known for its intelligence.

name: Brachiosaurus
description: One of the tallest dinosaurs, with a long neck that allowed it to reach high vegetation.

name: Stegosaurus
description: Known for the distinctive plates along its back and the spikes on its tail.

name: Allosaurus
description: A large theropod predator with sharp teeth and powerful arms with three-fingered hands.

name: Diplodocus
description: One of the longest dinosaurs, with an extremely long neck and tail.

name: Ankylosaurus
description: A heavily armored dinosaur with a club-like tail for defense.

name: Pteranodon
description: A flying reptile with a large wingspan, feeding on fish and small animals.

name: Parasaurolophus
description: A hadrosaur with a distinctive long, curved crest on its head.
